document.full_text: boeing co  will "retain the ability" to re-engine the current model of its hot-selling 737 narrow body jet should the company be unable to produce a completely redesigned version, chief executive jim mcnerney said on tuesday.
document.title: boeing may re-engine 737 if it cannot redesign: ceo
lines_and_colors: boeing co  will "retain the ability" to re-engine the current model of its hot-selling 737 narrow body jet should the company be unable to produce a completely redesigned version, chief executive jim mcnerney said on tuesday.
